name: White Pizza Sauce
steps: Melt Butter in a pan on the stove at medium heat
Add in Garlic and let sizzle until barely starting to brown
Stir in Heavy Cream, making sure Garlic doesn't brown much
Once bubbling/boiling, take the pan off heat and add Black Pepper
Once no longer bubbling, stir in Pecorino Cheese until consistent
Don't wait too long to spread onto pizza dough, it will grow stiff
comments: Do not try to make ahead of time, make right before spreading onto dough
